item.title: Contact
item.description: English Thanks for your interest. You can reach me through the following ways. I’ll get back to you as soon as possible: Email: info@simon-schraeder.de Mail Simon Schraeder A306 Ernsthaldenstr. 47 70565 Stuttgart Germany Mobile (+49) 1575 7031306 Twitter @der_simon German Impressum Angaben gemäß § 5 TMG: Simon Schraeder A306 Ernsthaldenstr. 47 70565 Stuttgart Germany Kontakt: Telefon: +49 (0) 1575 7031306 Telefax: - E-Mail: info@simon-schraeder.de Verantwortlich für den Inhalt nach § 55 Abs.
